content:
In general, 24 air targets were destroyed over the night and in the morning of air defense forces.

Certain dataI citedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak.

According to him, 12 missiles and 12 percussion drones in Dniprovsky, Kryvyi Rih, Pavlograd, Novomoskovsky, Kamyansky districts were shot down.

Earlier Sergey Lisak reported that as a result of blowsdamagedSeveral energy facilities are in the Dnieper, Kryvyi Rih and Kamyansky districts.

One of them was affected by a man. He was provided with the necessary medical care.

In Kamyansky, where the enemy has trumped a country cooperative, five more wounded.

As reported by the Armyinform, the military of the Russian FederationConductedLarge -scale aero -intelligence before inflicting a massive rocket strike in Ukraine tonight.
title: In the Dnipropetrovsk region, air defense forces destroyed 24 air targets
description: The head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak was specified. According to him, ...
author: Army Inform
